contentModules.heading: Resume
contentModules.copy: Here you'll find a more extensive view of my work history and the technology I'm comfortable with.

resumeItems.title: Web Developer
resumeItems.subTitle: Artifakt Digital
resumeItems.description: Built, maintained, and updated luxurious, sophisticated and complex real estate websites for clients in North America

resumeItems.title: Web Developer
resumeItems.subTitle: Simplistics
resumeItems.description: Built, maintained and updated e-commerce, non-profit, and internationally recognized brands' websites and plugins.

resumeItems.title: Youth Program Coordinator
resumeItems.subTitle: City of Brantford
resumeItems.description: Supervised and coordinated staff and participants of various youth programs in 2 city community centres.

resumeItems.title: Web Development Certificate
resumeItems.subTitle: Humber College
resumeItems.description: Post-graduate certificate studying all aspects of Full Stack Development from databases to front-end libraries and everything in between.

resumeItems.title: Exercise Science and Health Promotion
resumeItems.subTitle: Sheridan Colleg
resumeItems.description: Bachelor of Applied Health Sciences focused on Exercise Physiology and general health promotion concepts.

resumeItems.title: Fred Viktor
resumeItems.subTitle: Capital One Digital for Good Hackathon
resumeItems.description: Added an e-commerce shop to the existing website where users' could 'purchase' supplies like hot meals and clothing for the homeless population in Toronto. This was done in 1 weekend, with 4  team members.

resumeItems.title: Toronto Cat Rescue
resumeItems.subTitle: Capital One Digital For Good
resumeItems.description: Created an WordPress plugin for the existing website that accessed API data on available cats to donate for display on a page of their existing website.
